citeinfo.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 9 (1998) - PICES Climate Change and Carrying Capacity Workshop on the Development of Cooperative Research in Coastal Regions of the North Pacific : October 17-18, Pusan, Republic of Korea / Sponsored by PICES-GLOBEC, CCCC REX Task Team ; Organizing Committee, Anne B. Hollowed ... [et al.]

descript.abstract: This scientific report identifies the PICES member nations national research programs and the areas for cooperative search experiments in support of the CCCC Program. [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.9. ISBN 0969842090 ]
descript.purpose: To document findings from the PICES Climate Change and Carrying Capacity (CCCC) Workshop.

cntaddr.address: c/o Institute of Ocean Sciences P.O. Box 6000
